Media.title: Alan Wake
Media.creator: Remedy Entertainment
Media.thoughts: slow start/hard to get into but after a few hours it's super engaging and fun

Media.title: Cult of the Lamb
Media.creator: Massive Monster
Media.thoughts: chill farming sim vibes with binding of issac style combat and a really compelling story/amazing animation

Media.title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
Media.creator: Marvel
Media.thoughts: amazing animation, amazing story, really engaging and interesting all the way thru
